icalendar_data.DTSTART: DTSTART:{ref + relativedelta(**( {'days': 2} if ref.weekday() == WEDNESDAY else {'days': 1} if ref.weekday() < SATURDAY else {'weekday': MO } ))}

user_request: I want to schedule an event for weekends and wednesdays

icalendar_data.DTSTART: DTSTART:{ref + relativedelta(**( {'weekday': WE} if ref.weekday() < WEDNESDAY else {'weekday': SA} if ref.weekday() < SATURDAY else {'weekday': SU} if ref.weekday() < SUNDAY else {'weekday': WE} ))}
